name: FE (itch)
description:
This is a game for a Game Jam with the theme "Boss Rush".

2D platformer game where we need to kill bosses in order to restore the light in this world

Thank you for sharing this game jam with us. But this is not the end, better things will come.
Pray for us. 

Javier Cullotta (Soñador) - Game designe, aame artist, art director https://www.artstation.com/dreamerjac 

Sergio Martinez - Art advisor. 

Albert Navarro (Reixart) - Game artist         https://www.artstation.com/albert_navarro 

Julian Pasi (JotaPe) - Programmer                                                             https://julianpasi.itch.io/ 

Catalina Lara (DarthJäger) - Concept artist.   https://www.instagram.com/darth.jaeger/

Daniela Sol Gómez (WanielS) - Concept artist.         https://www.artstation.com/waniels

(link) Raquel Alvarado (Aquila Inferna) - Specialist accesor, UI designer. https://www.instagram.com/aquilainferna/

Francis Tello - Composer, Sound Designer, Audio Engineer. https://www.twitch.tv/midnight_pianist
